{{Description|With a peal of thunder, [[Haishan]] is slain.}}
'''Stormbreaker''' is [[Beidou]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|energy frame|11}}<ref name="Genshin Academy burst info sheet">GenshinAcademy: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iLUT8Tafwih3RZbNlA59w6-x5NQdgPvsMc86b7W92DQ/edit#gid=0 Elemental Burst Frame Tests]</ref>
* {{TalentNote|cooldown frame|2}}<ref name="Genshin Academy burst info sheet" />
* Although not explicitly stated, Thunderbeast's Targe persists when changing to another character in the team and continue to affect the active character.
* The discharges jump between enemies:
** At C0: 2 jumps, 3 hits including the first target (for example, with 2 enemies A and B, it will jump A ➔ B ➔ A, dealing damage for a total of 3 times)
** At C2: 4 jumps, 5 hits including the first target (for example, with 2 enemies A and B, it will jump A ➔ B ➔ A ➔ B ➔ A, dealing damage for a total of 5 times)
** In order for the jumps to occur, there needs to be '''at least 2 enemies'''. If there is only one enemy, there will be no jump and the discharge will only do damage once.
* {{TalentNote|snapshot|Lightning DMG|character=Beidou}}
* The effect may be discharged by ranged weapons up to a certain distance if it hits a valid target. If the attack hits the target from too far away, the effect may not be discharged.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|1|Sea Beast's Scourge|Upon using Stormbreaker, a shield is created that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15 seconds. This shield is 250% more effective against Electro DMG.}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|2|Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises}} See above for more information.
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|Crimson Tidewalker}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Bane of Evil}}
